Title: Ma
Description: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party in the basement of her home.

Title: Midsommar
Description: A couple travel to Sweden to visit their friend's rural hometown for its fabled midsummer festival

Title: Candyman
Description: an artist begins to explore the macabre history of Candyman, not knowing it would unravel his sanity and unleash a terrifying wave of violence that puts him on a collision course with destiny.
